channel.title: Event on Quanteda Initiative
channel.description: Recent content in Event on Quanteda Initiative

item.title: Quanteda presentation at Tokyo R meeting
item.description: At a meeting of Tokyo R on 15 June 2018 at Yahoo Japan’s headquarter, Kohei Watanabe presented what is quantitative analysis and what users can do using the latest quanteda. It was a great event where more than We are proud of 200 international audiences, including people from R Studio, turned out. We thank the organizers for giving us such a great opportunity.

item.title: Text analysis workshop at WZB Berlin
item.description: We will convene a quanteda workshop at the WZB Berlin Social Science Center on January 31, 2018. For the event we have developed a new tutorial website that contains a step-by-step introduction to quantitative text analysis using quanteda.

item.title: Quanteda v1.0 launch at LondonR event
item.description: At a meeting of London R meeting on 16 January 2018, we announced the release of quanteda v1.0. See the presentation here. We thank all the participants and organizers for the great opportunity and the excellent turnout. A video of the presentation is available on the YouTube channel of the Quanteda Initiative.

item.title: Text analysis workshop at ESSSC
item.description: We will convene a half-day workshop at European Symposium Series on Societal Challenges in Computational Social Science on quantitative text analysis using quanteda.
